code: export var getFullCourseCost=function getFullCourseCost(arr){console.log(arr);var currentSum=0;arr.forEach(function(el,i){return currentSum+=el.cost;});var fullCost=Math.ceil(currentSum);var costAbjustment=fullCost-0.01;return costAbjustment;};export var getFullCourseCostWithDiscount=function getFullCourseCostWithDiscount(cost,discount){var costWithDiscount=Math.ceil(cost-cost/100*discount);var costAbjustment=costWithDiscount-0.01;return costAbjustment;};
